title: Over 30 hospitalised due to Mirihana protest
body_lines: It was reported that 31 people, including police and Special Task Force (STF) personnel, who were injured during the protest in Mirihana, were admitted to the Colombo National Hospital (CNH) and Colombo South Teaching Hospital in Kalubowila.
15 STF personnel, 3 policemen including Nugegoda ASP and three journalists were among those admitted to the CNH.
Meanwhile, four people were admitted to the Colombo South Teaching Hospital, Kalubowila.  (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
